Package components.threshold

Class ThresholdAuctioneer

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
components.threshold.ThresholdAuctioneer
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI
public class ThresholdAuctioneer extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
Class that represent a threshold auctioneer component, this class is supposed to manage an auction of an threshold protocol bidding
Author:
Malik Bouaoud and Sandrine Ear
